ComicInfo.Summary: Signs and Portents Part 1: When Sara and Jake investigate the gruesome murder of a man named Tom Judge, his partner Tilly weaves them a story full of magical amulets, demons from hell and the deadly woman known as Lachryma. Tilly also tells them that Sara is Lachryma's next target.
